column4: hello can someone tell my what this kernel parameter is supposed to accomplish reserve=0xc0000000-0xd0000000, commenting it out seems to make no difference
Tomas: apt-add-repository ppa.. always worked fine for me
reserve=        [KNL,BUGS] Force the kernel to ignore some iomem area
might be a workaround against some bug on some systems, might not make any difference for you specifically
